step.para: Become superuser or assume an equivalent role.

Roles contain authorizations and privileged commands. The ZFS file system allows some administrative tasks to be delegated to specific users. For more information about Delegated Administration, see the ZFS Administration Guide. For more information about roles, see . To configure a role with the Primary Administrator profile, see Chapter 2, Working With the Solaris Management Console (Tasks), in System Administration Guide: Basic Administration.
